about_the_game:
YOUR CHOICES, YOUR DESTINY

Dive into the heart of feudal Japan, where a picturesque town becomes the stage for an epic saga. Meet Kaito, a noble and skilled samurai who values family and honor above all else. Determined to expose the dark secrets of the powerful Matsuda clan and restore justice to the city, Kaito's destiny is in your hands.

CONFLICT OF HONOR

As Kaito delves deeper into the Matsuda clan's hidden secrets, his quest for truth leads him into a deadly conflict with Lord Matsuda and his loyal warriors. Every step of Kaito's journey is fraught with danger, as he faces threats,conspiracies, and perilous challenges.

A SAMURAI'S JOURNEY

Kaito, a respected samurai, finds himself at the center of a dangerous conflict when he uncovers the dark secrets of the Matsuda family. During his investigation, he falls in love with Lady Miyuki, Lord Matsuda's daughter, who shares his doubts about her family's actions. Together, they navigate a world of political intrigue, power, and love, striving to restore honor and justice.

KATANA DYNASTY: UNVEILING HONOR offers a unique blend of samurai adventures, romance, and political intrigue, creating unforgettable emotions. Step into the shoes of Kaito and experience a world where your decisions have consequences and the fate of a city rests on your shoulders.

content_descriptors.notes: Buyers should be aware that this game contains adult content, including episodic scenes of a sexual nature, crime scenes, and battles without graphic violence. Please ensure that you are comfortable with this type of content before purchasing the game. It is recommended for mature audiences only, and players should be prepared for content appropriate for this category.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel 3rd generation Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000

name: KATANA DYNASTY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Conteúdo sexual
Drogas lícitas
Atos criminosos

short_description: Your choices control Kaito's life and the city's future. Will you be honest and righteous, or corrupt and destructive? With love or alone?
